description:
Лаптоп
Дисплеј:15.6" (39.6cm)
Резолуција:(1920x1080) FHD TN 250nits Anti-glare
Chipset:Intel® SoC Platform
Процесор: Intel® Core™ i5-1235U, 10C (2P + 8E) / 12T, P-core 1.3 / 4.4GHz, E-core 0.9
Графика:Integrated Intel® Iris® Xe Graphics Functions as UHD Graphics
RAM меморија:16GB (8GB soldered + 8GB SO-DIMM) DDR4-3200
Диск (Storage):512GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe® 3.0x4 NVMe®
Без оперативен систем
Аудио:High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek® ALC3287 codec
Звучник:Stereo speakers, 1.5W x2, Dolby® Audio™
Камера:HD 720p with Privacy Shutter
Микрофон:2x, Array
WLAN + Bluetooth: 11ac 2x2 + BT5.0
Порти:
1x USB 2.0
1x USB 3.2 Gen 1
1x USB-C® 3.2 Gen 1 (support data transfer only)
1x HDMI® 1.4b
1x Card reader
1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)
1x Power connector
Power Adapter - 65W Round Tip (2-pin, Wall-mount)
Батерија:38Wh - MobileMark® 2018: 5.5 hr
